title: Jafar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hypnotize a player, giving them a message of your choosing.
- For 3 Malice during the day, Send another player into the Cave of Wonders. This is functionally similar to a jailor's jail, but cannot kill.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Messages between you and your target will have you disguised as "Old Man".
- You cannot hypnotize your escort.

fields.name: Malice Overflow:
fields.value:
- You may now execute your escort.
- You are now referred to as "Jafar" within the Cave of Wonders.

desc:
Post 5425
*"Finally, you will bow to me!"*
